advancedItems.desc:
Grants +75% Spell Power Amplification.

(All sources of Spell Power are 75% more effective)
advancedItems.name: Rabadon's Deathcap

advancedItems.desc: Grants +125% Critical Strike Damage.
advancedItems.name: Infinity Edge

advancedItems.desc: Reduces the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by 25%.
advancedItems.name: Frozen Heart

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also Light.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Talisman of Light

advancedItems.desc: Basic Attacks have a 33% chance on-hit to silence the target, preventing mana gain for 4 seconds.
advancedItems.name: Hush

advancedItems.desc:
2.5 seconds after the wearer falls below 25% Health, allies are healed for 1200 Health.

This effect can trigger once per combat.
advancedItems.name: Redemption

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also a Warden.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Warden's Mail

advancedItems.desc:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 6 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Zephyr

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also a Mage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Mages Cap

advancedItems.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain +15% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
advancedItems.name: Zeke's Herald

advancedItems.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three Item Slots]
advancedItems.name: Thief's Gloves

advancedItems.desc:
Basic Attacks grant +4% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

No stacking limit.
advancedItems.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade

advancedItems.desc: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, the wearer deals 90 true damage to the caster.
advancedItems.name: Ionic Spark

advancedItems.desc: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%
advancedItems.name: Dragon's Claw

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer dodges all critical strikes.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Phantom Dancer

advancedItems.desc: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for 4 seconds.
advancedItems.name: Trap Claw

advancedItems.desc: Reflects 100% of the mitigated damage from enemy Basic Attacks as magic damage.
advancedItems.name: Thornmail

advancedItems.desc: Creates a zone of ice that expands when the wearer Dodges, slowing enemies' Attack Speed by 25%.
advancedItems.name: Iceborn Gauntlet

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also an Assassin.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade

advancedItems.desc: The wearer's Basic Attacks deal an additional 9% of the target's current Health as physical damage.
advancedItems.name: Giant Slayer

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's maximum Health as true damage, and reducing healing by 80%, over 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Red Buff

advancedItems.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following:
  • Basic attacks and spells deal +50% Damage
  • Basic attacks heal 50 Health on-hit
advancedItems.name: Hand Of Justice

advancedItems.desc:
Revives the wearer 2 seconds after dying, with up to 400 Health, and cleanses negative effects.

This effect can trigger once per combat.
advancedItems.name: Guardian Angel

advancedItems.desc: After casting their spell, the wearer gains 20 Mana.
advancedItems.name: Seraph's Embrace

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also Glacial.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Frozen Mallet

advancedItems.desc: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 60% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.
advancedItems.name: Runaan's Hurricane

advancedItems.desc: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 40% of the damage dealt.
advancedItems.name: Bloodthirster

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also an Inferno.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Inferno's Cinder

advancedItems.desc: Basic Attacks deal an additional 3% of the wearer's Maximum Health as magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies behind them.
advancedItems.name: Titanic Hydra

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also a Berserker.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Berserker's Axe

advancedItems.desc: After casting their spell, the wearer's Basic Attacks restore 18% of their maximum Mana.
advancedItems.name: Spear of Shojin

advancedItems.desc: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, the first target and up to 3 nearby enemies receive an additional 150 magic damage.
advancedItems.name: Luden's Echo

advancedItems.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300 damage for 8 seconds.
advancedItems.name: Locket of the Iron Solari

advancedItems.desc:
When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's maximum Health as true damage, and reducing healing by 80%, over 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Morellonomicon

advancedItems.desc: Grants +100% Attack Range.
advancedItems.name: Rapid Firecannon

advancedItems.desc: The wearer's Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from making Basic Attacks.
advancedItems.name: Sword Breaker

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer is also a Blademaster.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Blade of the Ruined King

advancedItems.desc:
The wearer's spells can critically strike.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Jeweled Gauntlet

advancedItems.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +30% Attack Speed and +30% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

No stacking limit.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
advancedItems.name: Repeating Crossbow

advancedItems.desc: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.
advancedItems.name: Force of Nature

advancedItems.desc: Grants a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after 3 seconds.
advancedItems.name: Quicksilver

advancedItems.desc:
Contributing to a kill grants +15 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 1).
advancedItems.name: Deathblade

advancedItems.desc: The wearer regenerates 6% of their missing Health per second.
advancedItems.name: Warmog's Armor

advancedItems.desc: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 100 magical damage to 3 enemies.
advancedItems.name: Statikk Shiv

advancedItems.desc: Basic Attacks and spells heal the wearer for 25% of the damage dealt.
